Metadata.title: Santillana Living
Metadata.description: Find your dream home in the serene landscape of Santillana del Mar.

Hero.title: Discover Santillana Living
Hero.subtitle: Your serene escape into nature's embrace. Build your dream home in the heart of Santillana del Mar.

Features.title: An Unparalleled Living Experience
Features.subtitle: Santillana Living is more than just a place to live, it's a lifestyle.

amenities.title: Lush Amenities
amenities.description: Enjoy access to private parks, walking trails, and community gardens, all within a secure, gated community.

lots.title: Spacious Lot Sizes
lots.description: Choose from a variety of lot sizes to build your custom home, with ample space for gardens, pools, and more.

payment.title: Flexible Payment Options
payment.description: We offer tailored financing plans to make your dream of owning a home in Santillana a reality.

Gallery.title: Explore the Beauty of Santillana
Gallery.subtitle: A glimpse into the lifestyle that awaits you.

DreamHomeVisualizer.title: Visualize Your Dream Home
DreamHomeVisualizer.subtitle: Use our AI-powered tool to create a personalized rendering of your potential home. Select your preferences and see your vision come to life.
DreamHomeVisualizer.cardDescription: Fill out the form below to get started.
DreamHomeVisualizer.featuresPlaceholder: e.g., Infinity pool, wrap-around porch, rooftop garden
DreamHomeVisualizer.loadingText: Our AI is building your vision...
DreamHomeVisualizer.placeholderText: Your generated dream home will appear here.
DreamHomeVisualizer.toastErrorDescription: There was a problem generating your dream home. Please try again.
